body.content: let's find out how much product designers get paid there's a site I really like called levels.fyi if you go here you can click on product designer right off the bat it shows you companies like Google Facebook and Amazon you could look at L3 Google which looks like the total comp is going to be 157 628 what you can do here is you can do data points you can look at what the base salary is stock Grant bonus and then you can see a chart so people are all over the board you have people that are making more than that and then you have people that are making less than that you can look here and see the offer letters that people have received over the past few years you can get an overview of the company their stock where they're located and then you can also learn about the benefits like what's unique to the company health insurance and wellness and so on you can search for almost any tech company and they'll have some data points for you to work with
body.title: How much does a #productdesigner get paid? #shortvideo
